headline: Avian influenza A(H5N1) - update 27: Situation (human) in Viet Nam
main_text: Situation (human) in Viet Nam Further details are now available for Viet Nam’s 22nd case of H5N1 infection, which was confirmed yesterday. The case was a three-year-old boy from Lam Dong Province. His death, announced yesterday, is the country’s 15th fatality.
